metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the ind-def:variable_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the ind-def:variable_test and all of its valid operations.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the variable_object is supported.

variable_test.comment: Test that the variable_object is supported.

variable_object.comment: Variable object that references the string values 'a', 'b', and 'c'.

variable_state.comment: This variable_state represents the variable_object where the var_ref equals 'oval:org.mitre.oval.test:var:244' and where only one of the values is 'a'.

constant_variable.comment: This variable represents the string values 'a', 'b', and 'c'.
This variable represents the string values 'a', 'b', and 'c'.
